text:
@GOP @WhiteHouse 🚨Trump pledged to clamp down on Washington’s influence peddling with a “drain the swamp”.. But during his administration, the lobbying industry has flourished, a trend that intensified once Congress passed more than $3.6 trillion in coronavirus stimulus.

https://t.co/xJTuhABsaH
